headline: Mondelēz International State of Snacking Survey: Global Consumers Seek More Intentional Opportunities to Indulge
summary: 2024 State of Snacking Report Consumers are striking a balance between wellness and pleasure by prioritizing indulging in their favorite snacks. Most consumers prioritize enjoying an indulgent snack over focusing on ingredientsConsumers agree snacking is one of the few indulgences they have these daysYounger generations snack to boost mood, find comfort, or manage stress CHICAGO, April 09, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Mondelēz International, Inc. (Nasdaq: MDLZ) today releases new findings on consume
